Package org.bukkit.block

Interface DaylightDetector

All Superinterfaces:
BlockState, Metadatable, PersistentDataHolder, PersistentDataViewHolder, TileState
public interface DaylightDetector extends TileState
Represents a captured state of a (possibly inverted) daylight detector.
